text: Kashi Nilou Isfahan Futsal Club () was an Iranian futsal club based in Isfahan. == History == === 2015-16 === Kashi Nilou terminated their sports activities due to financial problems in half season 2015-16. == Season-by- season == The table below chronicles the achievements of the Club in various competitions. {| border="1" cellpadding="2" style="border-collapse:collapse; text-align:center; font-size:normal;" |- style="background:#f0f6fa;" ! Season ! League ! Position ! Hazfi ! Notes |- | 2013-14 | 1st Div | 4th / Group A | bgcolor=FF6666|Withdrew | |- | 2014-15 | 1st Div | bgcolor=gold|1st | rowspan=2 bgcolor= black| | bgcolor=99FF66|Promoted |- | 2015–16 | Super League | bgcolor=FF6666|14th | bgcolor=FF6666|Withdrew from the League in half season |} == References == Category:Futsal clubs in Iran Category:Sport in Isfahan Category:2015 disestablishments in Iran Category:Defunct futsal clubs in Iran
title: Kashi Nilou Isfahan FSC
